name: Tom Caraminia
description: I’m Passionate about life, social justice, nature, God Fearing. Broad-minded, well-educated and informed, intellectually curious, articulate. I consider myself a man of good moral character, sincere and warm, compassionate and romantic. Fun-loving, very energetic, emotionally and financially stable, Loving, supportive, loyal, communicative, I’m attractive, and have a good sense of humor. Independent, responsible, professional. Introspective, thoughtful, caring. I enjoy most music, especially blues. Theatre, movies, reading, gardening,friendly, open. Love to walk, bike, dance, read, cook, , travel, go to movies, theater, lectures, concerts, and poetry readings. Am mechanically and directionally challenged. Healthy and fit, Laughter and smiles are important to me.
